𒑱𒋗 ≈≈ 𒁲 ??? in

𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 sa-a 𒅖𒆪 mil-ku counsel ≠ 𒂵 GA galac milk 𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 si-i 𒊭𒈾𒉡 ša-na-nu "equal" ≠ 𒄢 si 𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 di-e dice "speak" 𒅗 KA talk 𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 di-i di-i-nu dean judgment 𒁲 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 si-lim salam 𒂄𒈬 šul-mu "sau-wohl" well-being ≈ 𒆠 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 ki-i 𒆠𒆪𒌋 ki-ku-u 𒅕𒍣𒌈 ir-ṣi-tum "earth" 𒆠 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 ku-ú 𒆪𒌑 -''- ≈ 𒆠 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 gu-u 𒄖𒌋 𒈠𒀀𒌈 ma-a-tum "land" 𒄖 GA 𒆠 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 gi-e 𒄀𒂊 "hearth fire" 𒆠𒉡𒉡 ki-nu-nu kiln Kamin! 𓂝 𓐍 𓊮 𒆠 ≈ 𒑱𒋗 ga-gar 𒂵𒃻 "ground" 𒆕𒋡𒊒 qaq-qa-ru "ground"

𒅖𒆪 mil-ku 𒅖𒆪 advice, counsel, testicle

𒈠𒇷𒆪 ma-li-ku malik 𒈠𒇷𒆪 adviser, counsellor

𒈠𒊭𒇻 ma-ša-lu 𓏇 misil 𒈠𒊭𒇻 to equal

𒊭𒈾𒉡 ša-na-nu 𒊭𒈾𒉡 rival, to equal

𒅗𒊭𒁺 ka-ša-du 𒅗𒊭𒁺 arrive, equal, to reach

𒊭𒋡𒇻 ša-qa-lu shekel™ 𓎡 scale <> 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓎡 𓅱 𓂠 | scale-pan | ᵡHenkel 𒊭𒋡𒇻 pay, to weigh <> s'equal sackerl
